name: Fruit Grinder.io
description:
Fruit Grinder.io is a fun and endless platform game in which you control a cute little fruit. Yes, you heard us right – a cute little Fruit! The Fruit is trapped in a dangerous fruit grinder and you must help him avoid the rotating circular blades that keep appearing.

Main Features:

Choose different Fruits.
Swipe up to go up.
Swipe down to go down.
Your character moves side to side automatically.
